column1: #Text=# VISOLO: Grid-Based Space-Time Aggregation for Efficient Online Video Instance Segmentation
#Text=[VISOLO: Grid-Based Space-Time Aggregation for Efficient Online Video Instance Segmentation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2112.04177)
#Text=* The codes are under [projects/](projects/) folder, which follows the convention of detectron2.
#Text=* You can easily import our project to the latest detectron2 by following below
#Text=* Run a docker container and install the repository.
#Text=* On top of the docker container, install the repository by the following command.
#Text=we expect ytvis_2019 folder to be like
#Text=* Fine-tuning on YTVIS2019 with pre-trained weights on COCO dataset ([r50_coco.pth](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1rb3i9MBtAjh3SJ2AWdgb3PvuPpF8Swpi/view?
#Text=Due to the small size of YTVIS dataset, the scores may fluctuate even if retrained with the same configuration.
#Text=**Note:** The provided checkpoints are the ones with *highest* accuracy from multiple training attempts
#Text=| backbone  |  FPS |  AP  | AP50 | AP75 |  AR1 |  AR10 | download |
#Text=The overall flow of our VISOLO and the comparison of different VIS methods on the YouTube-VIS 2019 dataset are provided at https://youtu.be/j33H7vcJ2uU
#Text=This code is for non-commercial use only.
#Text=If our work is useful in your project, please consider citing us.
#Text=  title={VISOLO: Grid-Based Space-Time Aggregation for Efficient Online Video Instance Segmentation},
